title: Donald Trump vows to ‘never allow’ creation of a CBDC if elected
description:
U.S. presidential candidate Donald Trump made the promise during a campaign speech in Portsmouth to a round of cheers and applause.

U.S. presidential candidate and former president Donald Trump vowed to “never allow” the Federal Reserve to create a central bank digital currency (CBDC) in the United States. 

The pledge came during a campaign speech in Portsmouth, New Hampshire on Jan. 17 where the former president of the United States said: “Tonight I’m making another promise to protect Americans from government tyranny.”

“This would be a dangerous threat to freedom and I will stop it from coming to America,” he said.

Read more

title: Crypto Trader Transforms $10K into $1M in 10 Days, Thanks to Elon Musk’s ‘Chief Troll Officer’ Profile Update
description: A cryptocurrency trader has managed to turn $10,000 into a $1 million stash in just 10 days, taking advantage of a small change in the profile of X CEO Elon Musk, who wrote “(CTO) Chief Troll Officer) on his profile. title: AI Code Assistants – Navigating Productivity Peaks and Code Security Potholes
description: In the rapidly evolving landscape of software development, the role of AI code assistants is pivotal.
